医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的评论着眼于机器人外骨骼对后天性脑损伤患者行走恢复的影响新泽西州的一组研究人员审查了机器人外骨骼设备对后天性脑损伤患者行走恢复影响的证据，并为评估此类设备制定了严格研究所需的系统框架。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/New-review-looks-at-the-impact-of-robotic-exosculpts-on-recovery-of-ambulation-among-individuals-with-acquired-脑损伤.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/New-review-looks-at-the-impact-of-robotic-exosculpts-on-recovery-of-ambulation-among-individuals-with-acquired-脑损伤.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c39783a-3325-4562-865e-1d11afab9137 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:22:14 -0400 New review looks at the impact of robotic exoskeletons on recovery of ambulation among individuals with acquired brain injury
研究探讨慢性阻塞性肺疾病急性加重临床诊断的挑战最近的一项研究评估了慢性阻塞性肺疾病急性加重 (AECOPD) 的临床、实验室和放射学特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-explores-the-challenges-of-the-clinical-diagnoses-of-acute-exacerbation-of-chronic-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Study-explores-the-challenges-of-the-clinical-diagnoses-of-acute-exacerbation-of-chronic-obstructive-pulmonary-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=419fdeed-692e-4136-8ad0-78ce3b3371c5 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:21:00 -0400 Study explores the challenges of the clinical diagnoses of acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
COVID-19 大流行如何影响女性青少年的睡眠、心理健康和社交媒体使用？ BMC 儿科最近的一项研究评估了青春期女性睡眠质量、心理健康和社交媒体使用之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/How-did-the-COVID-19-pandemic-impact-sleep-mental-health-and-social-media-use-in-female-adolescents。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/How-did-the-COVID-19-pandemic-impact-sleep-mental-health-and-social-media-use-in-female-adolescents。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500bef21-47fe-42f0-86c4-78149f16317d Wed, 16 Aug 2023 08:14:00 -0400 How did the COVID-19 pandemic impact sleep, mental health and social media use in female adolescents?
一条胳膊和一条腿：意外账单如何搭上去医院的便车三个兄弟姐妹乘坐相同的救护车（从同一场车祸到同一家医院）最终如何得到三张截然不同的账单？答案就在《无意外法案》中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-How-a-surprise-bill-can-hitch-a-ride-to-the-hospital.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-How-a-surprise-bill-can-hitch-a-ride-to-the-hospital.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47cf078b-eaf9-404d-9fb5-b2aed29f2d87 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 07:53:10 -0400 An Arm and a Leg: How a surprise bill can hitch a ride to the hospital
美联储称医院重新分配医疗补助资金违反法律拜登政府希望打击一些医院之间的私人安排，以报销有助于为低收入人群提供保险的税款。它认为这种做法违反了联邦法律。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Feds-say-hospitals-that-redistribute-Medicaid-money-violate-law.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Feds-say-hospitals-that-redistribute-Medicaid-money-violate-law.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3de7823-f801-4c5e-a64e-8267bb1c22bd Wed, 16 Aug 2023 07:49:58 -0400 Feds say hospitals that redistribute Medicaid money violate law
Funyuns 和流感疫苗？加油站公司涉足紧急护理领域当卢·埃伦·霍维茨 (Lou Ellen Horwitz) 第一次得知一家加油站公司将开设一家连锁紧急护理诊所时，她表示怀疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Funyuns-and-flu-shots-Gas-station-company-ventures-into-urgent-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/Funyuns-and-flu-shots-Gas-station-company-ventures-into-urgent-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83b2038f-f42a-41a5-bcc5-086a79445516 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 07:48:14 -0400 Funyuns and flu shots? Gas station company ventures into urgent care
一份新报告发现，北卡罗来纳州的医院已起诉数千名患者一项新的分析显示，自 2017 年以来，以该州最大的公共医疗系统为首的北卡罗来纳州医院已起诉了数千名患者，该分析进一步揭示了美国医院惯用的激进策略，向拖欠账单的人收取费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/North-Carolina-hospitals-have-sued-thousands-of-their-病人-a-new-report-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/North-Carolina-hospitals-have-sued-thousands-of-their-病人-a-new-report-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c35d7cd3-a3b0-452a-b27e-d1960e267790 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 07:46:43 -0400 North Carolina hospitals have sued thousands of their patients, a new report finds
CovARC：精简、可扩展且准确的 COVID-19 风险计算系统一种游戏化工具，用于估计 COVID-19 大流行期间与日常活动相关的感染风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/CovARC-a-streamlined-scalable-and-accurate-COVID-19-risk-calculation-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/CovARC-a-streamlined-scalable-and-accurate-COVID-19-risk-calculation-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=086e7d46-54fb-49b3-9f7f-5fd6d7a134b3 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 06:42:00 -0400 CovARC: a streamlined, scalable and accurate COVID-19 risk calculation system

环境空气污染与左心室舒张功能异常的关系研究调查了左心室舒张功能异常（ALVDF）与环境空气污染之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/The-association-of-ambient-air-pollution-and-abnormal-left-心室-diastolic-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230816/The-association-of-ambient-air-pollution-and-abnormal-left-心室-diastolic-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6264a680-f781-430f-9d9e-78d71ec6a6f3 Wed, 16 Aug 2023 05:24:00 -0400 The association of ambient air pollution and abnormal left ventricular diastolic function
